name: DUSTNET
detailed_description:
DUSTNET is an asymmetrical cross-platform deathmatch, join as a PC, VR, or AR player and enter the ruins of a de_dust2 server.



PLAY IN AUGMENTED REALITY FOR FREE

Visit the DUSTNET website to download the mobile AR app!

Features


  • Play as a COMPUTER, VIRTUAL REALITY, or AUGMENTED REALITY player and join DUSTNET, each platform is its own unique player type in this experimental multiplayer server.
  • Explore the ruins of DUSTNET, unlock bhop, noclip, teleport, and other admin commands.
  • Work with your friends in VR & AR to edit the map and server, choose to be a competitive or cooperative player.
  • Dedicated servers in each continent.

short_description: DUSTNET is the last remaining de_dust2 server, join an asymmetrical cross-platform deathmatch as a COMPUTER, VIRTUAL REALITY, or AUGMENTED REALITY player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
